LanguageData.CompCamo.Name: Camouflage and Stealth
LanguageData.CompCamo.ShowOverlay: Show overlay graphic (indicating relative effectiveness) for colonists:
LanguageData.CompCamo.ShowMoteMsgs: Show overhead debug mote messages regarding detection:
LanguageData.CompCamo.ShowTerrainLogs: Show Terrain logging for missing mod extension:
LanguageData.CompCamo.AllowNPCCamo: Allow non-player controlled pawns, camouflage use:
LanguageData.CompCamo.DebugTip: (The following settings are developer debug tools and only relevant when in dev mode)
LanguageData.CompCamo.forceActive: Testing: Force all camo into Active mode
LanguageData.CompCamo.forceStealth: Testing: Force all active camo to use stealth
LanguageData.CompCamo.forcePassive: Testing: Force all camo into passive mode
LanguageData.CompCamo.ActiveCamoDesc: Click to change Active Camo state
